member.name: ITfSpeechUIServer.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the speech-related user interface elements on the TSF language bar.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfSpeechUIServer.ShowUI
member.summary: Sets the visibility state of the speech-related user interface elements on the TSF language bar.
member.param: Specifies whether to show (TRUE) or not show (FALSE) the speech-related user interface elements.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfSpeechUIServer.UpdateBalloon
member.summary: Sets the style and text of the speech balloon on the TSF language bar.
member.param: Contains a element that specifies the balloon style.
Pointer to a zero-terminated Unicode string that contains the text to show in the balloon.
Specifies the number of characters in the string of the pch parameter.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfSpeechUIServer
member.summary: The ITfSpeechUIServer interface manages the speech-related user interface on the TSF language bar.
